title: Tawanda Moyo
body:
Hello, welcome to my corner of the web. I am a generalist engineer with wide interests in technology particularly web browsers, web standards, communication protocols, and creating quality documentation. 

This website is an eclectic collection of different things such as my [work](projects), [writings](/blog), and [quotes](/tags/quotes) from books I have read.

 I am also an experienced Technical Writer, and some of my [technical writing](projects#technical-documentation) can be found here. 

You can also read my [blog](blog), learn more [about me](about), see the things I [use](uses), or visit my [now](now) page to see what I am up to.
